bib.title: Liner2—a generic framework for named entity recognition
bib.author: Marci{\'n}czuk, Micha{\l} and Koco{\'n}, Jan and Oleksy, Marcin
bib.abstract: The last model named Event mentions is for recognition of eight categories of event mentions:  action, state, reporting, perception, aspectual, i_action, i_state and light_predicate (Kocon  and Marcinczuk, 2016a). The categorization is done according to the TimeML guideline (
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 6th Workshop on Balto-Slavic Natural Language Processing
